Troubleshooting

Remove stuck workers from Sidekiq

If Sidekiq web interface shows workers which are processing failed jobs, you need to delete the jobs from redis.

Refresh the web interface and the stuck workers should be gone.

Forbidden 403 errors on Manager when harvesting records or previwing

Check if your harvester user authentication_token in your Supplejack API SupplejackApi::User.where(role: 'harvester')

Make sure the same authentication_token is set for your Manager and Worker Environment variables HARVESTER_API_KEY: "harvester access token"
